name: the ANGRY tomato sc(h)ooter 2000
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:
Press Space to throw. Don't hit the cars!
There's no restart so you have to restart the whole game.

Someone got angry at the electric scooters left around the city. And for some reason he's got a tomato to throw around. Knock the pesky scooter drivers down but don't hit the cars!

A very quick and silly game made for the 0 hour game jam (with almost 0 gameplay as well, heh). Assets mainly from earlier personal projects except the tomato and scooter 3d models made in a pinch. One hour goes by so fast!
